Remember, most of those are illustrated in the KTK 2005 catalogue.

Ron

Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: akasaka tsuba collection at the chicago show

ever viewed! Good that you are showing some of these fantastic "by
generation" tsuba.
>
> Ron
> STL
>
Isn't it wonderful ? only took the man 7 years !! and let's not forget
his other single theme tsuba collection !! Wish I took pics of that a
few years back !!

milt

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] akasaka tsuba collection at the chicago show
messages.msgSnippet: Good job, Milt. This was the most important Akasaka display that I ve ever viewed! Good that you are showing some of these fantastic by generation tsuba. Ron
messages.messageBody:
Good job, Milt. This was the most important Akasaka display that I've ever viewed! Good that you are showing some of these fantastic "by generation" tsuba.

Ron
STL

----- Original Message -----
From: bungotakadasword
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, April 30, 2007 5:34 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] akasaka tsuba collection at the chicago show


http://www.esnips.com/web/theboywhowouldbeking/?flush=1

owner of collection is very kind to allow me to take pics and gave
permission for me to post on the internet so tsuba lovers that couldn't
make it to the Chicago show can see them ( though never as good as
actually holding a few in hands !! )

milt
